text: @realDonaldTrump @IngrahamAngle Your flailing incompetence on the coronavirus, & infesting our White House actually, makes the coronavirus even scarier. Thanks to Incompetent Traitor Trump, as he improvises our way through a public health crisis, the United States has never been less prepared for a pandemic.
